notFound: The language you entered is not available.
notUserAmin: You need administrator permissions to do this.
notBotAdmin: I don't have administrator permissions in this server.

ping.pingAndMention: Hello, my ping is **{ping} ms**. You also mentioned: {mentioned}.
ping.noPing: Hello, I don't see my ping xd

languages.noArgs:
Please enter the code for the new language.
Example:`{prefix}setlang en`
Accepted languages are `es` (Spanish), `en` (English), `pt` (Portuguese).
languages.newLang: You have successfully updated my language for this server.
languages.error: An error occurred while trying to update my language in this server. If the error persists, please report it to my support server.
languages.noValid: That language code is not available.

prefix.noPerms: You need administrator permissions to change my prefix in this server.
prefix.noArgs: :x: | You must enter the new prefix!
prefix.noValid: :x: | The prefix length must be at least 1 character and at most 3!
